column4: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions
column5: Oct 14 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Wednesday:

column4: Intel's data center business seen rebounding in 2016
column5: Intel Corp's move to cut growth forecast for its highly profitable business that makes chips used in data centers may have disappointed investors  but analysts see the unit rebounding next year as more users take to cloud services.

column4: Intel's data center business seen rebounding in 2016
column5: Oct 14 Intel Corp's move to cut growth forecast for its highly profitable business that makes chips used in data centers may have disappointed investors  but analysts see the unit rebounding next year as more users take to cloud services.

column4: European Commission clears Intel's $16.7 billion bid for Altera
column5: BRUSSELS World No. 1 chipmaker Intel Corp gained unconditional EU antitrust approval on Wednesday for its $16.7 billion bid for Altera Corp  its largest ever acquisition.

column4: European Commission clears Intel's $16.7 billion bid for Altera
column5: BRUSSELS  Oct 14 World No. 1 chipmaker Intel Corp gained unconditional EU antitrust approval on Wednesday for its $16.7 billion bid for Altera Corp  its largest ever acquisition.
